channel.title: OldTimeScape needs a Development Team
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://www.oldtimescape.com/tos.php][IMG]http://img848.imageshack.us/img848/9954/oldtimescapepnglogo.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL][/center]
[center]I'm Dean Martin, owner of OldTimeScape.
Right now we're a small [PI] hosted on a 1Gb RAM with no webclient. We have about 12 players on average and hope to get more.
[b]Some things about me:[/b]
My names Dean I'm 17 I've been playing RSPS's for 4 years, I'm very dedicated and trust worthy I've had alot of experience and owning and running RSPS's. I've wanted to rune a successful RSPS for a long time and I'm getting the chance to do that.
[b]Spot's I need filled:
- Programmer (As soon as possible)
- Web Developer (No hurry)
If you interested in any of these spots please fill out the application(s) below.
Coder Application:
How long have you been programming?:
How active are you?:
How old are you?:
Work you've done.:[/b]
[b]Web Developer Application(PHP):
How long have you been scripting PHP?:
How active are you?:
How old are you?:
Sites you've scripted. (With proof):[/b]
Vouches from other players on your work will be nicely appreciated.
Regards,
Dean,[/center]
